action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image consists of several Tetris-like shapes in different colors on a white background. The shapes include red, purple, yellow, and orange pieces, each with a distinct arrangement. The shapes are scattered across the image without touching each other.

Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image consists of several Tetris-like shapes in different colors (dark blue, gray, green, light blue) arranged on a white background. The shapes are composed of four squares each, forming various configurations.

This is my DESCRIPTION: The image consists of several Tetris-like shapes in different colors on a white background. The shapes include red, purple, yellow, and orange pieces, each with a distinct arrangement. The shapes are scattered across the image without touching each other.
